tool_description: Screens cases for potential ethical issues, professional responsibility concerns, and regulatory compliance requirements before client engagement.

attorney_id.description: Unique identifier of the attorney handling the case

case_type.description: Type of legal case being screened

client_relationship.description: Nature of client relationship (new, existing, referral, former_opposing)

case_circumstances.description: List of relevant case circumstances or factors

jurisdiction.description: Legal jurisdiction for ethical rule compliance

representation_scope.description: Scope of legal representation (full, limited, consultation_only)

error_messages: Invalid attorney ID: Provide a valid attorney identifier
Invalid case type: Use a recognized legal case type
Invalid client relationship: Use new, existing, referral, or former_opposing
Missing case circumstances: Provide at least one relevant case circumstance
Invalid jurisdiction: Use a valid legal jurisdiction for ethics screening
Invalid representation scope: Use full, limited, or consultation_only
Invalid fee arrangement: Provide a recognized fee arrangement type
usage: Provide attorney ID, case type, client relationship, case circumstances, jurisdiction, and representation scope. Optionally specify fee arrangement. The tool performs ethics screening and provides clearance status.

ethics_clearance.description: Ethics clearance status (cleared, conditional, requires_review, denied)

identified_issues.description: List of potential ethical issues identified

compliance_requirements.description: Specific compliance requirements for the case
